name: Orbital Chase
description:
Orbital chase is a game for two players. One player is the hunter (red) and the other the prey (pink). When the hunter catch the prey, they switch role. The prey wins if it survives long enough.

Controls are :

Left player ZQSD

Right Player Arrow Keys

Left and Right  to rotate.

Bottom to jump.

Up to shoot (only for the hunter).

(ZQSD are the WASD of AZERTY keyboards. In your OS, you can configure your keyboard as if it was an AZERTY, even if it is not the case)
